title: WONDERFUL STORY & PERFORMANCES !!
review: Really enjoyed this film and highly recommend it. It was a good story & told well , well cast with excellent performances. and It kept me wanting to find out what happens next. A true thriller with some great twists & turns. Good cinematography with an excellent score. I agree with another reviewer that it kept my attention! I don't usually write reviews, but I really enjoyed this film & looked it up. And saw the good reviews which I agreed with. And then I saw a couple reviews that seemed intentionally spiteful & were not an honest assessment of this film. This is a good & enjoyable independent film. I definitely recommend it.

title: What a surprise!
review:
I just watched Moving Parts on Amazon and it was the quirky poster that drew me in and I must say I am happy I did.
This film has a retro fresh feel and what I loved the most was the plot twists!
It's the kind of movie you need to put your phone way while you watch or you'll quickly get lost.
I love these kind of movies where you just don't know what's going to happen!

title: Awful beyond comprehension
review:
From the very off with the fight scene on the bridge and the utterly awful acting - Oh my goodness you know what you are in for so better just switch off and watch Coronation Street instead.

Bottom of the barrel - nothing more I can say , words fail me!
